reference.title: Supported Devices Matrix
reference.shortdesc: This reference provides a detailed matrix of all IoT devices supported by the smart hub system, including their communication protocols, required mobile applications, and minimum firmware versions. Use this table to verify compatibility before attempting to connect devices.

section.title: Device Compatibility Table:
section.p: The following table lists the supported IoT devices along with their technical requirements and dependencies. Each entry includes the device name, communication protocol, required application, and the minimum supported firmware version. Filtering attributes such as product line or regional availability can be applied when generating output for specific audiences.
section.note: Filtering attributes such as product="consumer" or region="IN" can be added using conditional processing to target specific audiences or regional configurations.
